Uses of Class
com.github.essobedo.appma.task.Task

  • Packages that use Task 
    Package Description
    com.github.essobedo.appma.core
    The package containing all the main classes of the application manger.
    com.github.essobedo.appma.core.progress
    The package containing all the classes allowing to be notified of any progress of a given task.
    com.github.essobedo.appma.core.zip
    The package containing all the classes allowing to manipulate zip files.
    com.github.essobedo.appma.spi
    The package containing all components that are found thanks to the Service Provider Interfaces technology.
    com.github.essobedo.appma.task
    The package containing everything related to the tasks managed by the application manager.
